config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration code reads the 'depths.reflection' value from the options provided. It sets the 'maxReflectionDepth' variable to this value if it exists, otherwise, it keeps the current value. It also performs some validation on the depth values and initializes certain components based on the configuration options.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The 'depths.reflection' configuration is triggered when the 'build' method is called with the 'Options' object as a parameter. The frequency of triggering depends on how often the 'build' method is called in the system.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The 'depths.reflection' configuration impacts the behavior of the system by setting the maximum depth for reflection rays. This affects how many times a ray can bounce off reflective surfaces in the scene, which in turn affects the quality and realism of the rendered images.
